Hello there, I'm Haseeb ðŸ‘‹

I'm a Brooklyn-based Pakistani-American Filmmaker and Photographer, born and raised in Oklahoma.

I am available for work across the medium of image. I offer services for photography, film editing, videography/cinematography, and more. If you are looking for someone who can come on to your project as creative partner, you have come to the right place.

When Monet would paint he would be concerned with the concept of enveloppe, that is, the atmosphere between himself and the subject he painted. Whether I am capturing photos for your special moments by camera, or helping you bring your story to life in the editing process, I hope, together, we can capture the enveloppe.

Please don't hesitate to reach out via the contact form. I can't wait to hear about your project or event!

Haseeb Amin
